author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
Adam welcomes Megan Gardner and Taylor Pope--aka Fernside Dragons--to the cave to check out a selection of their incredible inflatable characters and costumes! Megan and Taylor started designing and fabricating inflatable sculptures during lockdown, and show Adam their techniques for making complex shapes and creatures come alive and fill up the cave!

Follow the work of Fernside dragons at: https://www.instagram.com/fernsidedragons/ and https://www.fernsidedragons.com/

Shot and edited by Josh Self
Music by Jinglepunks

Subscribe for more videos (and click the bell for notifications):  http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=testedcom

title: Adam Savage Learns How Inflatable Costumes Are Made!
